metadata.title: CVE-2017-13030 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
The PIM parser in tcpdump before 4.9.2 has a buffer over-read inprint-pim.c, several functions.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-13030` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

tcpdump - 4.9.2-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tcpdump package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.9.2-0ubuntu0.16.04.1').
